reviews.review_msg: I think Dr.Vinkovetsky is full of passion to teach and willing to help students for their papers. Such as after we submitted our proposal, he gave us feed back and talked with us individually and give us books that might help for our papers.

Amazing professor with a deep well of knowledge that he draws upon and shares with each and every student. Like any upper level class, you need to show up and put in the work, but if you do you will reap the rewards of knowledge and his expertise with the material.
He knows his stuff, and is totally enthusastic. He however, isn't the best lecturer in the world.
